features: Hydraulic lift system easily lifts up bed frame, revealing generous under-bed storage to keep belongings organized
LED backlit upholstered wingback headboard provides cozy back support and creates relaxing atmosphere with customizable RGB lighting
Built-in power strip with USB and USB-C ports keeps devices charged without cluttering bedside space
Sturdy metal frame with wooden slats supports up to 1000 lbs for long-lasting durability
Tufted linen-blend upholstery and subtle wingback sheltering effect lend an elegant, sophisticated look

RGB LED LIGHTS Noise-free System Thickened foam attached to metal beams greatly reduce the creaking noise in sleep. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best quality for the best price
reviews.reviewText: i absolutely love this bed! everything about it was just perfect, and it was exactly what i was looking for. the storage underneath has saved me so much space in my room, the lights are so nice, and the mechanism for lifting the bed is top tier. the instructions were clear, only took me about an hour and a half to build start to finish, the quality itself is like something out of a furniture store. there’s no creaking, no wobbling, i mean the design is superb! i was worried at first that i’d have to remove my bedding or secure it before lifting up the mattress but everything stays on and doesn’t slide at all. 10/10 i highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Daughter Absolutely Loves It.
reviews.reviewText: I decided to upgrade my king mattress for a new one. My daughter wanted the old one because she wanted to move up to a bigger bed. She didn't know I was going to totally redo her room. She thought I was going to put her mattress on a simple metal frame and then we'd get a head board later on. Needless to say she was totally surprised when she walked into her bedroom and saw this beautiful upholstered bed with all it's bells and whistles, including LED lighting, usb ports and power outlets. She loves the programable app that she downloaded to her phone that controls the various modes of the LED's. Space is at a premium since we moved up from a twin to a king, so the underbed storage is a plus. Her mattress is a Tempur-pedic which is very heavy, so she can't access the storage easily without my help. That info may be useful to prospective buyers who can't handle heavy lifting. It should be easier with lighter mattress brands/types. Assembly instructions were clear and concise. There are a lot of parts and pieces so bring a lunch. A power screwdriver or drill with a hex bit is a must or you'll be at it for a loooong time. All in all, it is an excellent product at a great price. As I said in the title, my daughter absolutely loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better then I expected
reviews.reviewText: Honestly better then I expected. I've never purchased a big piece of furniture like this online and it exceeded my expectations for the price.The Good:Sturdy.The hydraulics actually work and keep my king size matrass up very well. Feels really solid once its up.Having outlets up top and a little shelf are fantastic.Looks great.The Meh:I would have liked to have the storage underneath fully enclosed, like with an actual bottom instead of sitting directly on the carpet, but its still decent.Would have rather had two, or really more, usb-c ports instead of 1 x usb-c and 1 x usb-a.The Bad:It does take more effort then I expected to pull the matrass up before the hydraulics really kick in and help. Not a problem for me personally but I would not recommend this for younger kids or the elderly.There is also not as much storage space as I was expecting, it's not horrible but its not much more then I already had with my normal old bed frame. Though it is much easier to utilize the space now.There was some pieces missing the little sticker telling you which piece was which but it was easy enough to figure out with the images in the instructions.And lastly, it's a bit of a beast to put together, it took me about 4 hours to get everything together by my self and the headboard was a little bit of a pain to do solo.I recommend not tightening most of the screws until you get most of it together, I had to loosen some sections on the backboard and side panels to get everything to fit nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very nice bed frame
reviews.reviewText: nice and "quiet" bedframe.. no squeaks when we try to move around. i usually toss and turn when in bed at night and I don't wake my husband up! highly recommend. LED lights are a bonus and can be set to change with sound.bed is also sturdy.. also we followed the advice to flip the hydraulics! game changerspacious storage area but requires the cloth storage bags and not the big plastic ones.took us 3.5 hrs to set the bed up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful and durable
reviews.reviewText: The bed is very sturdy and this is the reason why it takes a good two hours to put it together.Pros: the bed is exactly what I expected from the online pictures. The bed has strip light and outlet to charge your phone. This is great and reduced the cluster next to the bed. The strip light comes with a remote control. It could be timed and the brightness is adjustable. It also has several colors and can change color fast and slow as how I set it. The biggest thing for me is how sturdy a bed is, and it is sturdy. The base is all metal and the wood slats has plastic cover on both end that securely snapped into the metal so they don’t slide up and down. The bed has two hydraulic that assists with lifting up the mattress and store things under the bed. The bed height is not too much. When I put my 12 inches mattress on top they look perfect together.Cons: Like all bed from Amazon, you will need to assemble it. The instruction is clear and easy to read, however due to the bed having a lot of moving parts, it takes longer than assembling any other bed I had before. So, it was not as simple as putting four legs into a frame. It took two adults around 2 hrs to get it done, so if you need to plan for a new bed before a certain time, make sure you plan accordingly and get a helper.Overall, after a few weeks sleeping on this bed. It did not creek, it did not give me the feeling of sleeping on a bed from Amazon. It feels solid and people have no idea I bought it from Amazon at all. Even the assembling part took awhile, I would still buy it again base on the quality of this product.
